entry.title: Microsoft Infuses AI With Human-Like Reasoning Via an “Algorithm of Thoughts”
entry.summary: A new technique combines the strengths of human cognition with algorithmic logic.

entry.title: DoorDash Follows Wendy's With An AI-Powered Order Taker
entry.summary: Doordash believes using AI could boost the bottom line “without sacrificing quality.”

entry.title: Influencers Double Down on PepeCoin Despite Recent Rug Accusations
entry.summary: The meme coin has sunk around 17% since insider trades startled investors.

entry.title: Grand Theft Auto 6: Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: Rockstar's next open-world game has been revealed through ample leaks and reports. Here's what we know so far about Grand Theft Auto 6.

entry.title: Crypto and AI Need Global Regulations, Says India’s Prime Minister
entry.summary: Narendra Modi will preside over this year’s G20 summit in New Delhi.

entry.title: Ben ‘BitBoy’ Armstrong Booted From YouTube Brand He Created
entry.summary: The company confirmed Armstrong’s removal on Twitter, making strong allegations that attack the influencer’s character.

entry.title: OpenAI Beckons to Businesses With An Enterprise Edition of ChatGPT
entry.summary: The latest offering from the AI leader promises better security, privacy, and speed.

entry.title: This Premium Glow-in-the-Dark Game Boy Plays All the Classics
entry.summary: Nintendo’s Game Boy gets a modern upgrade with the unofficial Analogue Pocket—now with a spooky vibe in tow.

entry.title: Space Nation CEO on Working With 'Independence Day' Director Roland Emmerich
entry.summary: Jerome Wu, CEO of Space Nation, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the upcoming Space Nation Online game in development and shares details on Space Nation Cofounder Roland Emmerich's role in the project.

entry.title: Bitcoin Holds Steady While Major Altcoins SUI and PEPE Plunge
entry.summary: Bitcoin seems to be returning to its low volatility having barely moved at all in the past week, but some major altcoin are experiencing a sell-off.

entry.title: SEC Fines LA Company $6 Million Over NFTs Sold as Securities
entry.summary: The company has also been ordered to destroy all the Founder's Key NFTs as a result of the settlement.

author.name: Decrypt AI, Edited by Stacy Elliot

entry.title: Balancer Suffers Nearly $1M Exploit as Team Urges Users to Withdraw Funds
entry.summary: Less than a week after the team first announced the vulnerability, DeFi project Balancer has been exploited for roughly $979,000.

entry.title: South Korean Crypto Exchanges Prepare for Tightened Reserves Requirements
entry.summary: Starting from next month, South Korean crypto exchanges with "real-name" bank accounts must maintain a minimum $2.3 million reserve fund.

entry.title: Maui Strong: Hawaii Artist Teams Up With Decrypt for NFT Fundraiser
entry.summary: The crypto community is called to support Maui wildfire victims with an open-mint digital collectible designed by muralist Jasper Wong.

entry.title: Bankman-Fried’s Legal Team Seeks ‘Temporary Release’ Ahead of October Trial
entry.summary: As Sam Bankman-Fried's trial nears, his defense team argued that the disgraced CEO won't be able to properly prepare whilst in prison.

entry.title: Friend.tech Revenues Plummet 90% as Social App Hype Cools
entry.summary: Some users are calling the end of Friend.tech, as Dune data shows user activity on the buzzy Base app has dried up dramatically this week.

entry.title: SHIB Devs Reopen Ethereum Bridge to Layer-2 Network Shibarium
entry.summary: Shibarium, a layer-2 scaling solution for the Shiba Inu blockchain, is now officially live after the network's rocky start this month.

entry.title: What is Friend.tech? The Social-Token Driven Decentralized Social Network
entry.summary: Social tokens combine aspects of traditional cryptocurrencies with patronage systems, allowing influencers, creators, and others to monetize a fan base in exchange for exclusive offers and content.

entry.title: Prime Trust Filing Reveals Cascade of Failures That Led To Bankruptcy Filing
entry.summary: The company recounted a litany of mistakes that include locking itself out of its own hardware Ethereum wallet.

entry.title: OnlyFans' Ethereum Holdings Sank—But 2022 Was Still A Good Year
entry.summary: The content creator marketplace enjoyed growth in fans and revenue, but the crypto bear market remains unforgiving.

entry.title: Oman Invests Millions In Crypto Amid Questions of Whether It's Sharia Compliant
entry.summary: The debate is ongoing among Islamic scholars at a time when the Muslim world is forging ahead in crypto adoption.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: XRP Gains Wiped Out, Seychelles Exchanges Ramp Up KYC, Circle Expands
entry.summary: Twitter was the place to watch and speculate about curious moves by the PepeCoin team as the token’s price continued plummeting.

entry.title: LatAm Firm Hashdex Joins Bitcoin Spot ETF Scrum With Distinct Plan
entry.summary: Instead of surveillance sharing with Coinbase, the company proposes using a regulated exchange.

entry.title: ‘Bad Actors’: Last PepeCoin Founder Claims PEPE Could Still Thrive
entry.summary: The 10 trillion remaining $PEPE under project control will be burned to ensure decentralization.

entry.title: Bear Market 'Much Worse Than Expected’: Analysts Pitch New Bitcoin Economy Framework
entry.summary: “It provides a toolkit to properly understand the economic realities of Bitcoin,” says co-author James Check of Glassnode.

entry.title: The Best AI Platforms for Navigating PDFs—That Are Not ChatGPT
entry.summary: Get the most out of PDFs with these AI tools that offer enhanced reading experiences.

entry.title: Researchers Explore the Promise and Peril of Using AI to Fight Cancer
entry.summary: One research study used generative AI to design a potent cancer treatment, while another found the technology gave dangerous advice.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Recover While Pepe Gets Squeezed
entry.summary: While most leading cryptocurrencies spent the week recovering, shady transactions from PepeCoin’s team kept the meme coin in free fall.

entry.title: USDC Market Cap Plummets to 2-Year Low–Here's 4 Reasons Why
entry.summary: With the market's second-largest stablecoin USDC in something of a death spiral, experts weigh on in what's keeping the digital dollar down.

entry.title: Champions Arena Is an Addictive Mobile Battler With Crypto Rewards
entry.summary: REVIEW: In this mobile-first turn-based RPG, players can buy characters with crypto and turn them into NFTs later.

entry.title: GAME REVIEW: Champions Arena from Gala Games
entry.summary: Champions Arena is a turn-based fantasy RPG from Gala Games, where characters can become NFTs and crypto can be used to purchase gems, one of the game's synthetic currencies. Decrypt's Kate Irwin takes us inside the game for her thoughts on the fun, mobile-first title.

entry.title: Ethereum Staking Is Booming—But Value of DeFi Assets Keeps Falling
entry.summary: Staking yields may be leaving investors with less incentive to use other DeFi protocols, as data shows a steady decline in locked assets.

entry.title: AI Deepfakes Are a Threat to Businesses Too—Here's Why
entry.summary: A KPMG report highlights the implications of AI-created deepfake content on businesses, including through scams and reputational attacks.

entry.title: Stephen King Isn't Afraid of AI—His Books Have Trained It
entry.summary: Horror master Stephen King believes that opposing AI "is like trying to stop industrial progress by hammering a steam loom to pieces."

entry.title: Biden's Crypto Tax Proposal Is Attempt to 'Kill' Adoption in US, Says Financial Services Chair
entry.summary: The U.S. Department of the Treasury and the IRS are aiming to make digital-asset trades more transparent—but McHenry said the proposal lacks clarity.

entry.title: Fortnite Returns With Luxurious Island Upgrade, Another Star Wars Icon
entry.summary: The Fortnite Last Resort season kicks off with ritzy estates, a beefy fish man, another Star Wars icon, and TikTok influencer Khaby Lame.

entry.title: Tor Network Is Now Using Bitcoin-Like Security to Guard Against Attacks
entry.summary: Instead of forcing clients to go after a static target, Tor asks clients to 'bid' using their PoW effort, Tor Project's told Decrypt.

entry.title: PEPE Plummets 17% as Team Transfers Millions to Exchanges
entry.summary: The popular frog-based meme coin PEPE has plummeted as the team remains silent on several large token transfers to exchanges.

entry.title: Dropbox Sunsets Unlimited Storage Plan, Partly Blames Crypto Mining
entry.summary: The popular cloud storage provider is ending its unlimited storage policy and transitioning to a new metered model.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor Ben Prendergast on the Future of Gaming
entry.summary: Voice actor Ben Prendergast, who's voiced characters in games like Apex Legends and God of War Ragnarok, shares his opinions on the tech space's history of "bubbles" and whether blockchain gaming has a future.

entry.title: The future of AI Stardom and Robotics with SingularityNET COO Janet Adams and Desdemona
entry.summary: In this interview, SingularityNET COO Janet Adams explains the intricate details that went into creating the Desdemona robot AI from Hanson Robotics and future plans for the AI Diva.

entry.title: Crypto a 'No-Brainer' for Video Games, Says Mino Games CEO
entry.summary: Mino Games CEO Sasha MacKinnon, developer of the upcoming Dimensionals game, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the studio's approach to digital collectibles.

entry.title: Michael Wagner's 'Controversial Take' on Crypto in Games
entry.summary: At Solana's PlayGG, Star Atlas CEO Michael Wagner shares his "controversial take" on crypto in games, shares the challenges of developing the upcoming scifi game, and how crypto's volatility has changed his perspective with Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: Interview: Angelic CEO on Building the Sci-Fi RPG on Solana and Ethereum
entry.summary: Angelic is a sci-fi roleplay game in development that will be free-to-play and offer optional, opt-in crypto features on Solana and Ethereum and a governance token. Metaverse Game Studios CEO and Founder Erkan Bayol tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he sees AAA traditional games as Angelic's main competitors and shares his vision for the game.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor on AI's Impact on Video Games
entry.summary: Ben Prendergast is an actor who has voiced characters like Apex Legends' Fuse, God of War Ragnarok's Tyr, and Patroclus in Hades. But as debates swirl around the use of artificial intelligence in entertainment in light of the SAG-AFTRA and WGA strikes, Prendergast gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin his honest take on the potential use of AI actors in games.

entry.title: Star Atlas CEO on Developing an MMO Game
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson speaks with Star Atlas Founder and CEO Michael Wagner about the MMO game's approach to development, marketing, and blockchain integrations.

entry.title: Aurory's Origin Story: How JRPGs Inspired the Games
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson talks to Aurory's Head of Marketing and Business Development Michael Natoli about the origins of the Aurory crypto games at the Solana PlayGG event.

entry.title: Parallel TCG: Inside the Sci-Fi Card Game’s Closed Beta
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes hands-on with Parallel’s closed beta on Windows PC to find out what sets it apart from other crypto card-battlers.

entry.title: Web3 Games Need to Compete with All Games, Says Solana Foundation GM
entry.summary: Solana Foundation's General Manager of Games Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Solana's PlayGG conference and shares his take on crypto gaming and the "play-to-earn" concept.

entry.title: Many Early Blockchain Games Were 'Cash Grabs,' Says Twitch Streamer Alliestrasza
entry.summary: "I wrote them off," Twitch streamer Alliestrasza said of her initial thoughts on many early blockchain games. She tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how her perspective on Web3 games has evolved over time and now sees blockchain games getting significantly better.

entry.title: 'MetalCore' Game Preview: Hands-on With the 'Titanfall' Meets 'Destiny' NFT Mashup
entry.summary: MetalCore is an upcoming mech shooter developed by Studio 369, and it's being developed on Ethereum scaling network Immutable zkEVM. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin played through the prologue and tested out the recent Alpha 3 online experience to get a sense of the NFT-infused mashup of Titanfall and Destiny.

entry.title: 'Give Projects a Chance,' Says Aurory's Michael Natoli on NFT Game Challenges
entry.summary: Aurory is an NFT-driven game franchise that started life on Solana and is expanding to other chains. Decrypt's Jason Nelson spoke with Aurory Head of Marketing Michael Natoli at Solana's PlayGG event, where Natoli shared his thoughts on the challenges that blockchain games face in reaching players.

entry.title: Solana Is Only Network Ready for Gaming: Solana Foundation's Johnny Lee
entry.summary: Solana Foundation General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Solana network will tackle the scaling problem that blockchain games pose for the industry.
